headline: Why Cracker Barrel (CBRL) Stock Is Trading Up Today

headline: Beef Prices Set Record as Supply Shrinks Despite Trump Push
summary: The average price for ground beef was $6.781 a pound in November, up 2.1% from September and 15% from a year earlier, the US Bureau of Labor Statistics said Thursday.  Steak prices rose to $12.285 a pound, a modest increase from September.  Last week, Costco Wholesale Corp. Chief Financial Officer Gary Millerchip told analysts there was “strong growth in higher-cost cuts of beef and even greater unit growth in lower-cost proteins like ground beef and poultry.”

content.title: Beef Prices Set Record as Supply Shrinks Despite Trump Push
content.summary: The average price for ground beef was $6.781 a pound in November, up 2.1% from September and 15% from a year earlier, the US Bureau of Labor Statistics said Thursday.  Steak prices rose to $12.285 a pound, a modest increase from September.  Last week, Costco Wholesale Corp. Chief Financial Officer Gary Millerchip told analysts there was “strong growth in higher-cost cuts of beef and even greater unit growth in lower-cost proteins like ground beef and poultry.”

headline: LongHorn Steakhouse Aims to Lure Inflation-Weary Beef Lovers
summary: Darden Restaurants executives think the casual-dining company may be benefiting from consumer weariness with high meat costs at grocery stores. Veal and beef prices rose 16% in November on the year, according to today's consumer-price index, despite overall inflation easing.

headline: Darden’s (NYSE:DRI) Q4 CY2025: Beats On Revenue
summary: Restaurant company Darden (NYSE:DRI) reported Q4 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7.3% year on year to $3.10 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.08 per share was 0.8% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: Darden’s (NYSE:DRI) Q4 CY2025: Beats On Revenue
content.summary: Restaurant company Darden (NYSE:DRI) reported Q4 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7.3% year on year to $3.10 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.08 per share was 0.8% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Darden Restaurants: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results did not meet Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 11 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.09 per share. The owner of Olive Garden and other chain restaurants posted revenue of $3.1 billion in the period, exceeding Street forecasts.

content.title: Darden Restaurants: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: The results did not meet Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 11 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.09 per share. The owner of Olive Garden and other chain restaurants posted revenue of $3.1 billion in the period, exceeding Street forecasts.

headline: November CPI, Nike earnings, mortgage rates: What to Watch
summary: Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton previews several of the biggest stories to come tomorrow, Thursday, December 18, including the release of November's Consumer Price Index (CPI) report, the latest reading on mortgage rates, and earnings results from companies like Nike (NKE), FedEx (FDX), and Darden Restaurants (DRI). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.
